content.html: hey! Totally get where you’re coming from. This could totally have been done in a nice, respectful way and there’s nothing Inherently creepy about asking for a number. Sadly- it was done with a very creepy vibe and gaze on my body, etc. Which I know isn’t clear in my tweet
